title: 🥙 "All you can do is try to live your best life from day to day and move forward with gratitude." - Brian Clark
content:
Given n pairs of parentheses, write a function to generate all combinations of well-formed parentheses.

Example:

$ formParens(1)
$ ["()"]

$ formParens(3)
$ ["((()))","(()())","(())()","()(())","()()()"]
